data.title: Weather in Vagayskiy Rayon, Tyumen Oblast, Russia
data.meta_description: The most accurate current weather forecast in Vagayskiy Rayon. Be prepared for today's weather with a detailed local report.
data.text:
The weather in Vagayskiy Rayon on Tuesday, August 13th, is going to be cloudy for most of the day, together with light rain in the early morning.

There is also a chance for drizzle in the early morning at about 7 am, and many clouds during the evening at about 8 pm.

Weather details for Vagayskiy Rayon, on Tuesday, August 13th:

The maximum temperature during the day is going to be 20°C at about 2 pm. The day will have very high relative humidity, with average humidity of 86%, ranging from 71% to a maximum value of 98% at about 11 pm. The wind will be breezy, and will get up to 26 km/h at 3 pm, blowing from the south-east. The cloud coverage will range from 73% around 8 pm to as high as 100% around 11 pm with an average of 97%.

The precipitation probability will change throughout the day between 0% and 55%. The highest chance for precipitation will be around 3 pm and the lowest probability around midnight. The dew point will range from 9°C up to a maximum value of 17°C around 6 pm.

The visibility is expected to be good with average visibility of 11 km throughout the day. Atmospheric pressure will be very low with average pressure of 1001 hPa. Sunrise will be at 4:51 am, and sunset at 8:05 pm. The day will have 15 hours and 14 minutes of daylight.

Air quality forecast for Vagayskiy Rayon, on Tuesday, August 13th:

On average, the air quality on this day will be good, meaning that air quality is satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk. According to our index, ranging from 0 to 500, the air quality is going to be between values of 27 and 51.

Pollen forecast for Vagayskiy Rayon, on Tuesday, August 13th:

Tree pollen on this day is expected to have very high risk. There's no risk of weed pollen, and as for grass pollen, this day is expected to have high risk.

Weather details for Vagayskiy Rayon, on Wednesday, August 14th:

The maximum temperature during the day will be 19°C at about 2 pm. The day will have very high relative humidity, with average humidity of 92%, ranging from 72% to a maximum value of 100% at about 6 am. The wind will be breezy, and will get up to 19 km/h at 2 pm, blowing from the south. The cloud coverage will range from 36% around 11 pm to as high as 100% around 4 pm with an average of 91%.

The precipitation probability will change throughout the day between 0% and 40%. The highest chance for precipitation will be around 5 am and the lowest probability around midnight. The dew point will range from 13°C up to a maximum value of 16°C around noon.

The visibility is expected to be good with average visibility of 12 km throughout the day. Atmospheric pressure will be extremely low with average pressure of 997 hPa. Sunrise will be at 4:53 am, and sunset at 8:03 pm, making it a total of 15 hours and 10 minutes of daylight.

Air quality forecast for Vagayskiy Rayon, on Wednesday, August 14th:

On average, the air quality on this day will be good, meaning that air quality is satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk. According to our index, ranging from 0 to 500, the air quality is going to be between values of 23 and 31.

Pollen forecast for Vagayskiy Rayon, on Wednesday, August 14th:

Tree pollen on this day is expected to have low risk. There's no risk of weed pollen, and as for grass pollen, this day is expected to have very low risk.
